description: Howlingstar is Raina`s dragon partner and the leader of the Communicators in the Lindworm Unit. He is the most energetic of his fellow Communicators and often likes to show off his skills. He is a spear type dragon. He can create a massive spear as his weapon of choice. In his dragon form, his finishing move is a high speed charge that pierces through the enemy.
name: Howlingstar
